TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Queue`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class Queue(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class Queue : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 指定队列中元素的类型。

span.span: Specifies the type of elements in the queue.

summary.span: 表示对象的先进先出集合。

span.span: Represents a first-in, first-out collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现泛型队列为一个循环的数组。This class implements a generic queue as a circular array. 对象存储在某一端插入和删除来自其他。Objects stored in a are inserted at one end and removed from the other. 当你需要为信息; 临时存储时，队列和堆栈非常有用也就是说，当你可能想要检索其值后放弃元素。Queues and stacks are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 使用如果你需要访问集合中存储的相同顺序的信息。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 使用如果你需要按相反的顺序访问的信息。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 使用或如果你需要同时从多个线程访问集合。Use or if you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 可以对执行三个主要操作及其元素：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 将元素添加到的末尾。 adds an element to the end of the . - 从开始处移除最旧的元素。 removes the oldest element from the start of the . - 查看返回的最旧元素的开头但不会删除从。 peek returns the oldest element that is at the start of the but does not remove it from the . 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 接受`null`引用为有效的值类型，并允许重复的元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的若干方法泛型类。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class. 此代码示例创建具有默认的容量的字符串的队列，并使用方法进行排队五个字符串。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，这不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消排队的第一个字符串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项，然后方法用于取消它的排队。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组并将队列元素复制到它，然后，数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份队列。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次队列的大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于复制数组元素在数组中间开头的位置。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数创建包含三个空元素开头的队列的第二个副本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在队列中，第一个副本方法清除该副本和属性将显示队列为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A同时，可以支持多个读取器，只要不修改该集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示此构造函数和多个其他方法泛型类。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several other methods of the generic class. 此代码示例创建具有默认的容量的字符串的队列，并使用方法进行排队五个字符串。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，这不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消排队的第一个字符串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项，然后方法用于取消它的排队。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组并将队列元素复制到它，然后，数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份队列。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次队列的大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于复制数组元素在数组中间开头的位置。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数创建包含三个空元素开头的队列的第二个副本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在队列中，第一个副本方法清除该副本和属性将显示队列为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 将元素复制到以相同的顺序由读取的集合。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the collection. 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`collection`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `collection`. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定使用的默认相等比较器的相等性为`T`，队列中的值的类型。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the queue. 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的若干方法泛型类，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认的容量的字符串的队列，并使用方法进行排队五个字符串。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，这不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消排队的第一个字符串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项，然后方法用于取消它的排队。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组并将队列元素复制到它，然后，数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份队列。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次队列的大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于复制数组元素在数组中间开头的位置。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数创建包含三个空元素开头的队列的第二个副本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在队列中，第一个副本方法清除该副本和属性将显示队列为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于 方法，但 不修改 。This method is similar to the method, but does not modify the . 如果类型`T`是引用类型，`null`可以添加到作为值。If type `T` is a reference type, `null` can be added to the as a value. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的若干方法泛型类，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认的容量的字符串的队列，并使用方法进行排队五个字符串。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，这不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消排队的第一个字符串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项，然后方法用于取消它的排队。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组并将队列元素复制到它，然后，数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份队列。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次队列的大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于复制数组元素在数组中间开头的位置。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数创建包含三个空元素开头的队列的第二个副本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在队列中，第一个副本方法清除该副本和属性将显示队列为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经等于容量的容量增加通过自动重新分配在内部数组和现有元素被复制到新数组中，在添加新的元素之前。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小于比在内部数组的容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。If is less than the capacity of the internal array, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果在内部数组需要可重新分配以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the internal array needs to be reallocated to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的若干方法泛型类，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认的容量的字符串的队列，并使用方法进行排队五个字符串。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，这不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消排队的第一个字符串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项，然后方法用于取消它的排队。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组并将队列元素复制到它，然后，数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份队列。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次队列的大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于复制数组元素在数组中间开头的位置。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数创建包含三个空元素开头的队列的第二个副本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在队列中，第一个副本方法清除该副本和属性将显示队列为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型类是可枚举。The following code example demonstrates that the generic class is enumerable. `foreach`语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中，`for each`在 c + +) 用于枚举队列。The `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) is used to enumerate the queue. 此代码示例创建具有默认的容量的字符串的队列，并使用方法进行排队五个字符串。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，这不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消排队的第一个字符串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项，然后方法用于取消它的排队。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组并将队列元素复制到它，然后，数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份队列。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次队列的大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于复制数组元素在数组中间开头的位置。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数创建包含三个空元素开头的队列的第二个副本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在队列中，第一个副本方法清除该副本和属性将显示队列为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 的访问。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步是仅当所有线程在访问该集合之前都锁定此对象有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

returns.span: 包含从 复制的元素的新数组。

span.span: A new array containing elements copied from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 则不会修改。The is not modified. 新数组中元素的顺序是从开始处的元素的顺序相同到其末尾。The order of the elements in the new array is the same as the order of the elements from the beginning of the to its end. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的若干方法泛型类，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 此代码示例创建具有默认的容量的字符串的队列，并使用方法进行排队五个字符串。The code example creates a queue of strings with default capacity and uses the method to queue five strings. 枚举队列的元素，这不会更改队列的状态。The elements of the queue are enumerated, which does not change the state of the queue. 方法用于取消排队的第一个字符串。The method is used to dequeue the first string. 方法用于查看队列中的下一项，然后方法用于取消它的排队。The method is used to look at the next item in the queue, and then the method is used to dequeue it. 方法用于创建数组并将队列元素复制到它，然后，数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份队列。The method is used to create an array and copy the queue elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the queue. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次队列的大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于复制数组元素在数组中间开头的位置。An array twice the size of the queue is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数创建包含三个空元素开头的队列的第二个副本。The constructor is used again to create a second copy of the queue containing three null elements at the beginning. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在队列中，第一个副本方法清除该副本和属性将显示队列为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the queue, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the queue is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Queue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Queue/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TrimExcess() cil managed

summary.span: 如果元素数小于当前容量的 90%，将容量设置为 中的实际元素数。

span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the , if that number is less than 90 percent of current capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于降低集合的内存开销，如果没有新的元素将添加到集合。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 重新分配和复制较大的成本但是，可能很大，因此方法不执行任何操作如果列表为在多个容量的 90%。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 这样可以避免产生的相对较小有所提高大型重新分配费用。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要重置为其初始状态，请在调用方法之前调用方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling method. 截去空的容量设置到默认的容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity.
